sentences.sentence: This enclosure was so vast that the outermost wall could hardly be seen.
sentences.translation: 这块圈地大得几乎看不见它最外面的围墙。

sentences.sentence: He fired and hit the outermost ring of the target.
sentences.translation: 他开枪射中了靶子的最外一环。

sentences.sentence: The outermost layer of the wall of the heart is also the innermost layer of the visceral pericardium.
sentences.translation: 心壁的最外层也是心外膜的最内层。
